com.ccode.alchemonsters.combat

Interface UnitController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientUnitController, GenericUnitController

    public interface UnitController
    A controller interface for managing and directing the actions of a single creature unit in battle.
    Author:
    caleb

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • setAllActions

        void setAllActions(java.util.ArrayList<BattleAction> actions)
        Sets all possible actions available to this unit. This list ignores constraints from the context of the battle/combat. Calls to this method should result in any filters previously placed on this unit's actions to be removed.
        Parameters:
        actions -

      • getAllActions

        java.util.ArrayList<BattleAction> getAllActions()
        Gets all the possible actions available to this unit. The returned list will ignore all constraints from the context of the battle.
        Returns:

      • filterAllActions

        void filterAllActions(java.util.function.Predicate<BattleAction> filter)

      • filterAvailableActions

        void filterAvailableActions(java.util.function.Predicate<BattleAction> filter)
        Filters the actions available to this unit based on a given predicate. Implementations of this function should result in the same return value for getAllActions() but a filtered return value for getAvailableActions().
        Parameters:
        filter -

      • getAvailableActions

        java.util.ArrayList<BattleAction> getAvailableActions()
        Gets all currently available actions for this unit. This list will not include those that have been filtered out.
        Returns:

      • resetAvailableActions

        void resetAvailableActions()
        Removes all filters imposed on the list of available actions.

      • isActionSubmitted

        boolean isActionSubmitted()

      • submitAction

        void submitAction()

      • getSelectedAction

        BattleAction getSelectedAction()

      • setSelectedAction

        void setSelectedAction(int selectedIndex)

      • setCharging

        void setCharging(int move,
                 int tar)
        Sets the move that this controller is charging
        Parameters:
        move - the index of the charging move in the mon's move list
        tar - the index of the target on the opposing team

      • stopCharging

        void stopCharging()

      • isCharging

        boolean isCharging()
        Checks to see if a controller is charging any move
        Returns:

      • getCharging

        int getCharging()
        Returns:
        the index of the move the active creature is charging

      • getChargingTargetPos

        int getChargingTargetPos()

      • setRecharging

        void setRecharging(boolean isRecharging)

      • isRecharging

        boolean isRecharging()

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        This method will be called on a battle controller whenever a new set of actions is available and the controller needs to select a new action. It should result in isActionSelected() being equal to false, until the controller has selected a new action.
